A2.name: UN Second Administrative Level Boundary Project
A2.description: Note: the unsalb.org website is no longer accessible, and public access to the boundaries resources has been removed http://www.ungiwg.org/content/united-nations-international-and-administrative-boundaries-resources

G2.name: OpenStreetMap
G2.description: Note: the code should be formed by prefixing the relevant OpenStreetMap ID with node/ way/ or relation/ as appropriate, e.g. node/1234567
